LanguageData.SleepingSpot.label: sleeping spot
LanguageData.SleepingSpot.description: Designates a spot on the ground where people should sleep. Not comfortable.
LanguageData.Blueprint_SleepingSpot.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_SleepingSpot.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.DoubleSleepingSpot.label: double sleeping spot
LanguageData.DoubleSleepingSpot.description: Designates a spot on the ground where two people should sleep together. Not comfortable.
LanguageData.Blueprint_DoubleSleepingSpot.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_DoubleSleepingSpot.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.Bed.label: bed
LanguageData.Bed.description: A cozy mattress and sheets on a frame for resting.
LanguageData.Blueprint_Bed.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_Bed.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Bed.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.DoubleBed.label: double bed
LanguageData.DoubleBed.description: A simple double-wide bed that fits two people.
LanguageData.Blueprint_DoubleBed.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_DoubleBed.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_DoubleBed.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.RoyalBed.label: royal bed
LanguageData.RoyalBed.description: A luxurious gold-inlaid bed fit for the highborn. Very comfy and beautiful, it is a work of art in itself. Fits two.
LanguageData.Blueprint_RoyalBed.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_RoyalBed.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_RoyalBed.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.HospitalBed.label: hospital bed
LanguageData.HospitalBed.description: A bed specially designed for use in hospitals. Adjustable for a patient and festooned with built-in equipment, it improves medical outcomes over normal beds.
LanguageData.Blueprint_HospitalBed.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_HospitalBed.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_HospitalBed.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.Bedroll.label: bedroll
LanguageData.Bedroll.description: A simple bed that lays on the floor, usually made of cloth or leather, often lined with fur. It is lightweight and can be rolled up for easy transport, but it is not quite as comfortable as a typical bed. Caravans can use bedrolls while traveling for better sleep.
LanguageData.Blueprint_Bedroll.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_Bedroll.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Bedroll.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.BedrollDouble.label: double bedroll
LanguageData.BedrollDouble.description: A simple double-wide bed that lays on the floor, usually made of cloth or leather, often lined with fur. It is lightweight and can be rolled up for easy transport, but it is not quite as comfortable as a typical bed. Caravans can use bedrolls while traveling for better sleep.
LanguageData.Blueprint_BedrollDouble.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_BedrollDouble.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_BedrollDouble.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingSpot.label: animal sleeping spot
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingSpot.description: Designates a spot on the ground where animals should sleep.
LanguageData.Blueprint_AnimalSleepingSpot.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_AnimalSleepingSpot.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingBox.label: animal sleeping box
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingBox.description: A small box for animals to sleep in. Fits smaller animals like chickens, cats, or small dogs.
LanguageData.Blueprint_AnimalSleepingBox.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_AnimalSleepingBox.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.AnimalBed.label: animal bed
LanguageData.AnimalBed.description: A soft bed for animals to sleep on. Fits any animal.
LanguageData.Blueprint_AnimalBed.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_AnimalBed.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_AnimalBed.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.Stool.label: stool
LanguageData.Stool.description: A simple platform on which to sit. Not very comfortable, but much better than nothing. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.Blueprint_Stool.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_Stool.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Stool.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.DiningChair.label: dining chair
LanguageData.DiningChair.description: A comfortable and attractive chair. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.Blueprint_DiningChair.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_DiningChair.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_DiningChair.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.Armchair.label: armchair
LanguageData.Armchair.description: A large, soft, comfy seat. Great for relaxation. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.Blueprint_Armchair.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_Armchair.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Armchair.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.EndTable.label: end table
LanguageData.EndTable.description: A small bedside table which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.Blueprint_EndTable.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_EndTable.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_EndTable.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.Table1x2c.label: table (1x2)
LanguageData.Table1x2c.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.Blueprint_Table1x2c.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_Table1x2c.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Table1x2c.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.Table2x2c.label: table (2x2)
LanguageData.Table2x2c.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.

LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_Table2x2c.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Table2x2c.label: FrameLabelExtra

LanguageData.Frame_Table2x4c.label: FrameLabelExtra

LanguageData.Blueprint_Table3x3c.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_Table3x3c.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Table3x3c.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.PlantPot.label: plant pot
LanguageData.PlantPot.description: Plant decorative flowers here to improve the mood of people nearby.
LanguageData.Blueprint_PlantPot.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_PlantPot.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_PlantPot.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.TorchLamp.label: torch lamp
LanguageData.TorchLamp.description: A wooden torch for lighting an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be automatically refueled with wood. Produces a small amount of heat.
LanguageData.Blueprint_TorchLamp.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_TorchLamp.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.StandingLamp.label: standing lamp
LanguageData.StandingLamp.description: An electrical standing lamp that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed.
LanguageData.Blueprint_StandingLamp.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_StandingLamp.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_StandingLamp.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Red.label: standing lamp (red)
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Red.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in red.
LanguageData.Blueprint_StandingLamp_Red.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_StandingLamp_Red.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_StandingLamp_Red.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Green.label: standing lamp (green)
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Green.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in green.
LanguageData.Blueprint_StandingLamp_Green.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_StandingLamp_Green.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Blue.label: standing lamp (blue)
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Blue.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in blue.
LanguageData.Blueprint_StandingLamp_Blue.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_StandingLamp_Blue.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.SunLamp.label: sun lamp
LanguageData.SunLamp.description: An industrial lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.
LanguageData.Blueprint_SunLamp.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_SunLamp.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_SunLamp.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.Shelf.label: shelf
LanguageData.Shelf.description: A shelf for storing miscellaneous items. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.Blueprint_Shelf.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_Shelf.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Shelf.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.Dresser.label: dresser
LanguageData.Dresser.description: A dresser. Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one dresser near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.Blueprint_Dresser.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_Dresser.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Dresser.label: FrameLabelExtra
